ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du dbang bsgyur bas chos mi la sogs pa gzhan gyis khrel du dogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /ye shes la dbang ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas gzhan rgol bar dgas pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /

dbyibs brgyad la/ thung ngu la ltos nas mdung khyim lta bu ni ring po'o/ /ring po la ltos nas mda' lta bu ni thung ngu'o/ /gru bzhi lta bu ni lham pa'o/ /zlum po lta bu ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /sa gzhi thag thug med pa lta bu ni mnyam pa'o/ /sa gzhi thag thug can lta bu ni mi mnyam pa'o/ /de'u

dang bog ri lta bu ni sgang ngo / rdzing gi nang lta bu ni gshong ngo / /mtshungs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan mnyam pa lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru mang nyung med pa ni yi ge mtshungs pa'o/ /gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan zhing

tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu dang ldan par 'dra ba ni gsung mtshungs pa'o/ /chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med cing bdag med pa rnam gnyis su thugs su chud par 'dra ba ni chos mtshungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi skur mnyam ste bye brag che chung med pa ni sku mtshungs pa'o/ /bden

pa bzhi gcig cing yang bzhi bzhir brtags pa la/ 'gog pa la ni 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'o/ /lam la ni lam dang / rigs pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / nges par 'byin pa'o/ /sdug bsngal la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'o/ /

kun 'byung la ni rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rkyen dang / 'byung ba'o/ /de la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams spangs te mi 'byung ba ni 'gog pa'o/ /las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal

ci yang mi 'byung ba ni zhi ba'o/ /phyis kyang khams gsum du skye zhing sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur bas na gya nom pa'o/ /khams gsum btson ra dang 'dra ba nas thar cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas bde bar phyin pas na 'byung ba'o/ /lam ni so so'i skye bo'i sa nas 'phags pa'i gnas su 'gro

bas na lam mo/ /mi rigs pa nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i gnyen por gyur pas na rigs pa'o/ /sems phyin ci log spangs te phyin ci ma log par sbyor bas na sgrub pa'o/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa dang gtan bral zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin par byed pas na nges par 'byung ba'o/ /

sdug bsngal ni skad cig ma re re las skyes shing 'chi ba'i chos can yin pas na mi rtag pa'o/ /sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshe bas na sdug bsngal ba'o/ /phung po lnga'i nang na mu stegs kyis brtags pa'i bdag rtag pa med pas na stong pa'o/ /phung po lnga po nyid kyang

mu stegs kyis brtags pa'i bdag rtag pa ma yin pas na bdag med pa'o/ /kun 'byung ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / de las 'phros pa 'jig rten pa'i las dge sdig rnams ni rgyu'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang las de dag gis bag

chags sems kyi rgyud la sogs te/ khams gsum rgyud lnga'i skye ba'i sa bon du gnas pa ni kun 'byung ba'o/ /phyi ma'i las dge bas ni dge ba'i bag chags brtas/ las mi dge bas ni mi dge ba'i bag chags brtas shing 'bras bu smin par byed pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o/ /de ltar rgyu dang rkyen gnyis

tshogs te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags so sor brtas nas khams gsum gyi gnas mthon dman du sdug bsngal gyi phung po mngon par bsgrub pa ni 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /dge slong rnam pa lnga la long sprang lta bu ni slong ba'i dge slong ngo / /khyim pa'i ming dge slong zhes btags pa lta bu ni ming gi dge slong

ngo / /khrims ma mnos sam/ yang na mnos kyang khrims ral te med par gnas pa ni nga yang dge slong yin no zhes zer bas/ khas 'ches pa'i dge slong ngo / /mkhan po dang slob dpon las tshul khrims gtsang mar mnos pa ni gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i

dge slong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du gang zag zung bzhi ya brgyad po rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i dge slong ngo / /sgrib pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / the tshom mo/ /de dag ci la

sgrib ce na/ lhag pa'i bslab pa gsum la sgrib ste/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gtong mi phod da/ 'phyo g.yem dang / rku 'phrog la sogs pa byed pa yin la/ gnod sems ni khro zhing zhe sdang gtong mi phod nas srog gcod cing gzhan la 'ching brdeg la sogs pa'i nyes pa

mang po byed pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sgrib par byed do/ /rmugs pa ni sems blong ste mi gsal ba yin la/ gnyid ni sems nang du 'dus nas yul la 'jug pa'i rang dbang med pa yin zhing / 'gyod pa ni legs nyes kyi las ci byas so cog la nyes so bar khu 'phrig za ste/ cham la mi

phebs pa yin la/ g.yeng ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'am/ sngon gyi spyod lam dran pa'i rjes su yan par song ste btang snyoms sam rtse gcig tu 'jog mi nus pas lhag pa'i sems la sgrib par byed do/ /the tshom ni zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin mi

rtogs te/ lam kha brag tu byung na gar 'gro mi shes pa dang 'dra bas lhag pa'i shes rab la sgrib par byed de/ de ltar bslab pa gsum la sgrib pa'o/ /zas bzhi gang zhe na/ kham gyi zas dang / reg pa'i zas dang / yid kyi zas dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas so zhes bya ba la/ 'dod pa'i khams

kyi lha dang mi rnams dang / byol song gi rgyud phyugs la sogs pa rnams las phal cher kham gyi zas kyis 'tsho zhing des srog 'dzin pas kham gyi zas so/ /bya la sogs pa sgo nga'o cog ni ma'i drod kyis reg pas 'tsho ste/ des srog 'dzin pas reg pa'i zas zhes bya'o/ /rus sbal rgya mtsho na

'dug pa'i bu skam la gzhag pa de ma'i sems ji srid du bu la dran pa de srid du bu'i srog 'dzin pa ni yid kyi zas zhes bya'o/ /lo nyes byung ste bzar med nas mas bu rnams la nga don gnyer du 'gro ste slar 'ongs dang phye 'di'i zan sbrus te sbyin no zhes brid nas thal ba'i thum bu gcig gdung ma la btags te bzhag

nas ma ni thal byung shir song / bu rnams ni thal ba'i thum po la blta zhing ma 'ongs na zan sbrus te bza' ba'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i rgyus yun ring mo zhig tu ma shi rab srog 'dzin nus pa lta bu ni rnam par shes pa'i zas zhes bya'o/ /theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan bzhi la/ byis pa nyer spyod bsam gtan dang / /

don rab 'byed pa'i bsam gtan dang / /de bzhin nyid dmigs bsam gtan dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba bsam gtan dang / zhes bya ba la theg pa ni gang zag so so rang rang gi shes rab la bya ste/ shes rgya chung zhing gang zag la bdag med pa nyi tshe tsam 'chad pa ni theg pa chung ngu zhes bya la/ 'dir ni

chos dang gang zag rnam gnyis la stong pa nyid du chung ba'i shes rab rgya chen po la theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni/ sems ma g.yeng zhing nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang ma 'dres par rtse gcig tu gnas pa ni nges pa'am gtan la dbab pa ste/ de lta bu'i rgyu las theg pa che chung gi shes rab

tshad ma thams cad 'bras bur 'byung bas na bsam gtan la dbab pa'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya ste/ bzhi ni ming gis smos pa rnams so/ /de yang rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / nga yod pa dang / gtsang sbrar lta ba'i skye bo rnams ni byis pa zhes bya ste/ phyin ci log de dag

spangs pa'i don ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang mi gtsang ba dag bsgom pa ni byis pa nyer spyod bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /mos pas spyod pa'i sar phung po lnga la/ gzugs kyi phung po la dbu ba lta bu dang / tshor ba la chu bur lta bu dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bu dang / 'du byed la chu shing

lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur 'dzin zhing bsgom pa ni don rab 'byed pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /sa dang po yan chad sa bcu pa man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings stong pa'i don sa re re zhing ye shes kyi khyad par gyis rim par bsgom pa ni de bzhin nyid dmigs

bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /shes bya thams cad ma lus par thugs su chud cing nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pas ci la yang rnam par mi rtog par lhun gyis grub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma lus par 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba bsam gtan zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi

rnam grangs kyi brjed byang zhes bya ba lo tsA ba chen po dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta la sogs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[]@/ /chos kyi rnam grangs kyi brjed byang gi rtsa ba bzhugs// @#/ /chos kyi rnam grangs/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

phung po lnga ni/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /de la gzugs kyi phung po ni bco lnga ste/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / des rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bcu gcig go/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ sa'i

khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams so/ /rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o/ /

tshor ba'i phung po ni gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa rnams so/ /'du shes kyi phung po yang gsum ste/ chung ngu dang / rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshad med pa'o/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni sems las byung ba'i 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig dang / sems dang mi ldan pa bcu

bzhi'o/ /sems las byung ba'i 'du byed ni reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang lnga ni kun du 'gro ba'o/ /'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni yul so sor nges pa'o/ /dad pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod

pa dang / ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / bag yod pa dang / btang snyoms dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang bcu gcig po 'di ni dge ba'o/ /'dod chags dang / khong khro ba

dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshom dang drug ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / rgyags pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang / rmugs

pa dang / rgod pa dang / ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / bag med pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa dang nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o/ /'gyod pa dang / gnyid dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa ste/ bzhi po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/ /de la lnga ni kun du 'gro ba'o/ /

lnga ni yul so sor nges pa'o/ /bcu gcig ni dge ba'o/ /drug ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /nyi shu ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o/ /bzhi ni gzhan du'ang 'gro ba'o/ /de la nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon

pa'i nga rgyal dang / chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /lta ba'i rnam pa lnga ste/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/ /sems dang ldan pa

ma yin pa'i 'du byed ni gzugs dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i gnas skabs la gdags te/ thob pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'du shes med pa dang / srog gi dbang po dang /

rigs mthun pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / gnas pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs dang / so so'i skye bo nyid dang / de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad de/ mig gi

rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par shes

pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa'o/ /yul ni brgyad de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhin nyid do/ /nyon mongs pa

can gyi yid kyi 'khor bzhi ni/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba dang / bdag tu chags pa'o/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni/ sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid dang / lus kyi kun gzhi dang / rgyu nyid dang / lus la gnas pa nyid dang / dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs

su ma chad pa dang / ris gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa'o/ /skye mched bcu gnyis ni/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i/ sna'i/ lce'i/ lus kyi/ yid kyi/ gzugs kyi/ sgra'i/ dri'i/ ro'i/ reg bya'i/ chos kyi skye mched do/ /khams bco brgyad ni/ mig gi khams

dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba/ sna/ lce/ lus/ yid/ rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni/ phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba

ni sa bon las ni myu gu/ myu gu las 'dab ma/ 'dab ma las sdong bu/ sdong bu las sbu gu/ sbu gu las snying po/ /snying po las me tog/ me tog las 'bras bu'o/ /rkyen drug ste/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyi khams rnams so/ /nang gi rten cing

'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/

sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba/ tshor ba 'gags

pas sred pa/ sred pa 'gags las len pa/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba'

zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /rkyen ni khams drug ste/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /de dag kyang rnam pa lngar lta ste/ rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / 'pho bar ma yin pa dang / rgyu chung ngu las 'bras

bu chen por 'byung ba dang / de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu drug ni/ byed pa'i rgyu dang / lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang / kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o/ /rkyen bzhi ni/ dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / bdag po'i rkyen dang /

de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang / rgyu'i rkyen no/ /'bras bu lnga ni/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o/ /bden pa gnyis ni/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don

dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /kun rdzob kyi bden pa la yang gnyis te/ yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rdzob po/ /mtshan nyid gsum ni/ kun brtags dang / gzhan dbang dang / yongs su grub pa'o/ /chos lnga ni/ ming dang / rgyu mtshan dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / de bzhin

nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /bdag med pa gnyis ni/ chos la bdag med pa dang / gang zag la bdag med pa'o/ /theg pa gsum ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'o/ /dkon mchog gsum po ni/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog

dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog go/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang bzhi'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi

bskyed par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang phyir zhing 'byung ba dang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang

yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du

byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /stobs lnga ni/ dad

pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag

byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pe yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni/ yang dag

pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lam lnga ni/ tshogs kyi lam dang / sbyor ba'i lam dang / mthong

ba'i lam dang / bsgom pa'i lam dang / mthar phyin pa'i lam mo/ /tshogs kyi lam lnga ste/ so so skye bo'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa dang / zas kyi tshod shes pa dang / nam gyi cha stod cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / shes bzhin du gnas pa la mngon par

dga' ba'o/ /sbyor ba'i lam ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa bzhi ste/ snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba mched pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de kho na'i don tshig gi phyogs gcig tu zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de ma thag pa sems kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /mthong ba'i lam ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa

dang po'o/ /bsgom pa'i lam ni sa gnyis pa nas sa bcu pa'i bar du'o/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ni/ rab tu dga' ba

dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / leg pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa ni kun du 'od do/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /

mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum ni/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig

pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs pas byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par

mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges par lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba la nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin nyid du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par

shes pa drug ni/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / lus kyi rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las

kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge

'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /

dbang bcu ni/ tshe la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba dang / ca co mi mnga' ba dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus

nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes

kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la

'jug pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa'o/ /sde snod gsum ni/ 'dul ba'i sde snod dang / mdo sde'i sde snod dang / chos mngon pa'i sde snod do/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i

sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bur byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i

sde'o/ /dgongs pa bzhi ni/ mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa dang / dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang / don gzhan la dgongs pa dang / gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa'o/ /ldem por dgongs pa bzhi ni/ gzhug pa la ldam por dgongs pa dang / mtshan nyid la

ldem por dgongs pa dang / gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa dang / bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa'o/ /bden pa bzhi ni/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo/ /sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /

bdag med pa'o/ /kun 'byung gi bden pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ kun 'byung dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / rab tu 'byed pa'o/ /'gog pa'i bden pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'gog pa dang / bzhi ba dang / gya nom pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'o/ /lam la yang bzhi ste/ lam dang / rigs

pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / nges par 'byin pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi tshogs lam la lnga ste/ so so skye bo'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa dang / zas kyi tshod shes pa dang / nam gyi cha stod cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / shes bzhin du gnas par mngon par dga' ba'o/ /

sbyor ba'i lam ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi ste/ drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / 'jig rten chos kyi mchog go/ /mthong ba'i lam ni sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug go/ /bsgom pa'i lam ni/ lam chung ngu dang / lam 'bring po dang / lam chen po dang / sbyor ba'i lam dang / bar

chad med pa'i lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam dang / khyad par gyi lam mo/ /lam chung ngu la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring po dang / chung ngu'i chen po'o/ /lam 'bring po la yang gsum ste/ che 'bring chung gsum mo/ /lam chen po la yang gsum ste/ che

'bring chung gsum mo/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam ni/ mi slob pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi shes pa bcu drug ni/ sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes

pa'o/ /kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung la chos shes pa dang / kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/ /'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / 'gog pa la chos shes pa dang / 'gog pa

la chos rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / 'gog pa la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/ /lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / lam la chos shes pa dang / lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi rnam par

bral ba'i lam ni brgyad/ 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o/ /'jug pa bzhi ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa la 'jug pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba la 'jug pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la 'jug pa dang / dgra bcom pa la 'jug pa'o/ /'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi ni/ rgyun du zhugs

pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni gnyis te/ rim gyis pa dang / cig car nges par 'byung ba'o/ /rim gyis pa ni/ ji skad bstan pa yin no/ /cig car nges par 'byung ba ni/ gang bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs

par byas nas/ mi lcogs pa la brten te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams cig car spong ste/ 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid la gnas so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni gnyis te/ bse ru ltar gcig

tu gnas pa dang / tshogs dang spyod pa'o/ /de ni nyan thos kyi sde snod la dmigs nas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos grub pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi lam ni brgyad de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / snyoms par

'jug pa bzhi'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min

gyi skye mched do/ /bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste/ rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste/ nang rab tu dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang /

sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /gsum pa la yan lag lnga ste/ btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste/ btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa dang /

sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /yang gnyen po'i yan lag dang / phan yon gyi yan lag dang / de gnyi ka'i gnas kyi rang bzhin gyi yan lag go/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba

dang / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba dang / sdug pa'i rnam pa mngon du byas nas gnas pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi

skye mched dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba dang 'gog pa mngon du byas nas gnas gnas pa'o/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ni/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu ni/ mi rtog pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /zad

par gyi skye mched bcu ni/ zad par dkar po'i skye mched dang / zad par dmar po'i skye mched dang / zad par ser po'i skye mched dang / zad par sngon po'i skye mched dang / zad par sa'i skye mched dang / zad par chu'i skye mched dang / zad par me'i skye mched dang / zad par rlung gi skye mched dang /

zad par nam mkha'i skye mched dang / zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched do/ /sems can gyi khams gsum ni/ 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa'o/ /'dod pa'i khams na sems can gyi ris nyi shu gnas te/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad/ grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad

do/ /nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni/ gcig gam gnyis sam dang por rang rang gi rgyu las 'grub pa'o/ /dud 'gro na chu dang tha dad nam mkha'i spyod yul lo/ /yi dags rnams ni chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i pho brang na'o/ /mi'i gling bzhi ni/ ba lang spyod/ sgra mi snyan/ lus 'phags

po/ /'dzam bu gling ngo / /lha'i ris drug ni/ rgyal chen ris bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do/ /gzugs khams bcu bdun ni/ tshangs pa dang / tshangs chen dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don no/ /

bsam gtan gnyis pa la/ 'od chung / 'od gsal/ tshad med 'od do/ /bsam gtan gsum pa la ni/ dge chung dang / dge rgyas dang / tshad med dge'o/ /bzhi pa la/ sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha lnga ni/ mi che ba dang /

mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i lha'i ris bzhi ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /

'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs chung ngu A tsAr+ya dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[]@/ /pho brang stong thang lhan dkar gyi chos 'gyur ro cog gi dkar chag bzhugs/ @#/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum la sogs te/ bod kyi rgyal khams su dam pa'i chos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi mtshan byang dkar chag bris shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs kyi mdun sa nas/ 'brug gi lo la pho brang lhan dkar na bzhugs pa'i ston/ sgra bsgyur gyi ban+de dpal brtsegs

dang / ban+de klu'i dbang po la sogs pas dam pa'i chos theg pa che chung gi mdo sde dang / gzungs che phra dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / bstod pa dang / smon lam dang / bkra shis dang / 'dul ba'i sde snod dang / mdo sde'i TI kA dang / dbu ma'i bstan bcos dang /

bsam gtan gyi yi ge dang / rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos dang / tar ka'i gzhung la sogs pa bod khams su chos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi mtshan byang bam po dang sh+lo ka'i grangs su mchis pa gtan la phab nas yi ger bris pa/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs su

gtogs pa la/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ sh+lo ka 'bum/ bam po sum brgya/ 'phags pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ sh+lo ka nyi khri lnga stong / bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa khri brgyad stong pa sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong / bam po drug cu/

'phags pa khri pa/ sh+lo ka khri/ bam po sum cu rtsa gsum dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa brgyad stong pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad stong / bam po nyi shu rtsa drug dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya drug cu ste/ bam po bdun dang / sh+lo ka

drug cu/ 'phags pa bdun brgya pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa lnga brgya pa/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa/

sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa lnga bcu pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa kau shi ka /sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gcig /'phags pa shes rab snying po sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu

rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa yi ge nyung ngu / /sh+lo ka sum cu tham pa'o// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa la/ 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde sangs rgyas phal po che/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yan chad la/ sh+lo ka sum khri dgu stong sum cu ste/

bam po brgya sum cu dang / sh+lo ka sum cu yod pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'ur gtogs pa la/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bcu bzhi/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u/ sh+lo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste bam po bcu

gsum/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu bstan pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po bcu drug /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa/ sh+lo ka stong

lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig /'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo/ sh+lo ka dgu stong ste bam po sum cu tham pa// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi

rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba'i le'ur gtogs pa la/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yan chad las/ 'phags pa sdom pa gsum bstan pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa/ sh+lo ka stong ste bam po gsum dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa mi

'khrugs pa'i bkod pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po lnga dang / sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa go cha bkod pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /'phags pa chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis dbyer med par bstan pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/

'phags pa chos bcu pa/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya drug cu/ 'phags pa 'od zer bsgrub pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ 'phags pa byang chub sems pa'i sde snod/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste/ bam po nyi shu/

'phags pa mngal na gnas pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ sh+lo ka stong chig brgya bzhi bcu ste

bam po gsum dang / sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bco lnga/ 'phags pa gang pos zhus pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug /'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka stong ste bam po gsum dang / sh+lo

ka brgya/ 'phags pa khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa glog sbyin gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya sum cu ste bam

po gcig dang / sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/

'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya rtsa brgyad de bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa des pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa khyim bdag dpas

byin gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa gang gA'i mchog gis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis

byin pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul

bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas

pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya bcu gsum ste/ bam po bzhi dang sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa bu mo dad ldan gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum

brgya rtsa bcu ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa'i chos brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po/ /sh+lo ka drug brgya bdun cu ste/ bam

po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng seng ge'i sgra/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa drang srong

rgyas pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde sna tshogs la/ bam po nyi shu rtsa drug man chad nas/ bam po bcu gcig pa yan chad la/ 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po/ /sh+lo ka bdun stong brgyad brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa drug /

'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bdun stong lnga brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa/ sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po bco brgyad/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa/ sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po bco

brgyad/ 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ /sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ 'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po/ /sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po/ /sh+lo ka sum stong

dgu brgya ste bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po/ /sh+lo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa sa'i

snying po 'khor lo bcu pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig /'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig// //

bam po bcu man chad la/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ /sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis

zhus pa/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa 'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa gsum ste bam po

brgyad dang sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gsum/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sde snod tshul khrims 'chal ba tshar gcod pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ 'phags po blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa dkon

mchog 'byung gnas/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa/

bam po bdun/ 'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad+ma dkar po/ /sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po/ /bam po drug /'phags pa

dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa/ bam po drug /'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa/ bam po drug /'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo/ /bam po drug /'phags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin/ bam po drug /'phags pa lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa/ bam

po drug /'phags pa dad pa'i stobs skyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya bdun cu ste bam po lnga dang / sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'khrul pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'phags pa mi 'am

ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ bam po lnga/ 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ bam po lnga/ 'phags pa rnga bo che'i mdo/ /bam po lnga/ 'phags pa rin po che chen po'i mdo/ /bam po lnga/ 'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa/ sh+lo ka stong sum brgya drug cu rtsa lnga ste bam po

bzhi dang / sh+lo ka brgya drug cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ste bam po bzhi dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag /sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bam po bzhi dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa dgongs pa

nges par 'grel pa sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya nyi shu ste bam po bzhi dang sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa dkon mchog za ma tog bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa rgyan

stug po bkod pa/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/

'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya nyi shu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo

ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya rtsa bcu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bgro ba/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u/ bam po gsum/

'phags pa me tog gi tshogs/ bam po gsum/ 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin/ bam po gsum/ 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa/ bam po gsum/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ bam po gsum/ 'phags pa de bzhin

gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig /bam po gsum/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ /bam po gsum/ 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rnam par rtse ba'i le'u/ sh+lo ka brgyad brgya nyi shu ste bam po

gnyis dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi shu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin/ sh+lo ka drug brgya drug cu ste/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu bsgom pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya bcu dgu ste/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bcu dgu/

'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol ba/ sh+lo ka drug brgya rtsa bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

bstan pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can

la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun du ston pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa/

bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa sangs rgyas su grub pa rnam par bkod pa/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa rdo rje snying po'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya bdun cu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/ 'phags pa dpal dbyangs kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka lnga

brgya ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags

pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka dgu bcu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal po'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bzhi brgya ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa glang po'i rtsal gyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka sum brgya drug cu ste/ bam

po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad sdud pa/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags

pa dpal sbas kyi mdo/ /bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yul la rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya bzhi

bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ /sh+lo ka sum brgya rtsa bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul

yongs su dag pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa/ bam po gcig /'phags pa chos kyi tshul nges pa dang ma nges par 'grol ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa/ bam po gcig /'phags pa 'dul ba rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bam po gcig /'phags

pa mar me 'bul ba/ bam po gcig /'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ bam po gcig /'phags pa chos kyi tshul/ bam po gcig /'phags pa ye shes rgyas pa/ bam po gcig /'phags pa thabs la mkhas pa/ bam po gcig /'phags pa sprin

chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u bam po gcig /bam por ma longs pa la/ 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya brgyad cu/ 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa drug /'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya

drug cu/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya drug cu/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa drug /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa/ sh+lo ka nyis

brgya nyi shu/ 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya bcu/ 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha'/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya bcu/ 'phags pa khye'u rin chen zla bas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya rtsa drug /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zad

pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa chung ngu / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri/ sh+lo ka brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad/

'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa/ sh+lo ka brgya drug cu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya drug cu/ 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa chos kyi phung po/ /sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa 'jam

dpal gnas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa/ sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig /'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spangs pa/ sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu/ 'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka

brgya rtsa bco lnga/ 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bco lnga/ 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu gcig /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa sh+lo ka brgya rtsa lnga/ sh+lo ka brgya man chad la/ 'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang

mdzad kyi snying po/ /sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa grong khyer gyi 'tsho ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa don brgya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sh+lo ka brgya/

'phags pa don dang chos rnam par 'byed pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu rtsa gcig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu/ 'phags pa bram ze mo

dpal ldan gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu/ 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya/ shA+o ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho/ /sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka

brgyad cu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po/ /sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa

lnga/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa sgra chen po/ /sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa bkra shis

brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa gcig /'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po/ /sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa gcig /'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa kun du rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/

'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chung ngu / sh+lo ka 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa/ sh+lo ka phyed dang bco lnga/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum

'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka bcu gcig /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa chung ngu / sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa/ sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bcu// //mdo chen por gtogs pa la/

mdo chen po kun du rgyu dang kun du rgyu ma yin pa dang mthun pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba/ sh+lo ka sum brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /mdo

chen po lnga gsum pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi shu/ mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po/ /sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga/ mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsdu ba/ sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ mdo chen po stong pa nyid/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu/ mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog /sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ mdo chen

po rgyal mtshan dam pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rgya las bsgyur ba la/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka khri nyis stong drug brgya ste bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa mdzangs blun gyi mdo/ sh+lo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste/

bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/ /sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa rin po che'i le'u sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa thabs la mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin la lan

gyis blan pa'i chos kyi yi ge /sh+lo ka nyis stong tshig brgya ste bam po bdun/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge /sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug /'phags pa sangs rgyas mdzod/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po/ bam po lnga/

'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba/ bam po lnga/ 'phags pa thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa'i chos bzhi bsgrub pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/

bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa gtsug tor chen po las bdud kyi le'u bstan pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ tshangs pa'i dra ba/ bam po gnyis/ chos kyi rgya mo/ /bam po gnyis/ yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo/ /bam po gnyis/ pha ma'i drin lan bstan pa/ sh+lo ka

sum brgya ste bam po gcig /rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo/ /bam po gcig /sems can gyi skye shi'i rtsa ba bstan pa bam po gcig /'phags pa byams pa lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ dge bcu dang du blang ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka brgya/ chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo bar snang ba

bstan pa/ sh+lo ka dgu bcu/ yang dag pa'i legs pa'i yon tan bshad pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ rgyal bu kun du dge ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu// //theg pa chung ngu'i mdo sde la/ 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa/ sh+lo ka khri nyis stong dgu brgya ste bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum yan chad 'gyur/ 'phags pa las brgya tham pa sh+lo ka khri chig stong chig brgya ste/ bam po sum cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ sh+lo ka drug stong drug brgya ste/ bam po nyi shu rtsa

gnyis/ gcig las 'phros pa'i lung / sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po bco brgyad/ 'jig rten gzhag pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ rgyu gdags pa/ bam po bdun/ las gdags pa sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ bzang sbyin gyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka drug brgya

ste/ bam po gnyis/ rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo/ /bam po gnyis/ las rnam par 'byed pa chung ngu / bam po gcig /ri glang ri lung bstan pa/ bam po gcig /las kyi rnam par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i gzhung / sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/ bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ sh+lo ka

nyis brgya rtsa bcu/ tshe'i mtha'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis brgya rtsa lnga/ skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ khams mang po'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ dga' ba can gyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ gang zag gi mdo/ /sh+lo ka brgya/ phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ sh+lo

ka brgya/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ gsal rgyal gyis tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka drug cu/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ khyim bdag

'du shes kyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ lha'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka sum cu/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka sum cu/ gnas 'jog gi mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyi shu/ gzhon nu dpe'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyi shu/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhag pa'i phan yon/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bcu bdun/ lha'i mdo nyung du/ sh+lo ka bcu bdun/ sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka bco lnga/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo/ /sh+lo ka bco lnga/ chos bzhi bstan pa/ sh+lo ka

bcu gsum/ chos bzhi'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ gaN+Di'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu/ zla ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu// //bstan bcos la ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ gnas brtan spyan drangs pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ dgra bcom pa dge 'dun [(]'phal [,]'phel[)]

gyis lung bstan pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ sbyin pa'i rabs/ sh+lo ka brgya/ dkyil 'khor dbul ba'i phan yon bstan pa/ sh+lo ka bco lnga/ de'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka bcu// //gsang sngags kyi rgyud la/ 'phags

pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka bdun stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po nyi shu rtsa drug yan chad 'gyur/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog /sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ rgyud kun

las btus pa/ bam po bcu gnyis/ 'phags pa legs par grub pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa/ sh+lo ka stong dgu brgya lnga bcu ste bam po drug dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ de'i bsdus 'grel slob dpon bud+d+ha

gup+tas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong sum brgya ste bam po bdun dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya/ de'i 'grel pa slob dpon bud+d+ha gup+tas mdzad pa sh+lo ka

sum stong ste bam po bcu/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'phags pa bsam gtan phyi ma'i rim par phye ba/ sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ de'i 'grel pa slob dpon

bud+d+ha gup+tas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum/ gzungs chen po lnga la/ 'phags pa rma bya chen mo sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal

mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ /sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa bsil ba'i tshal chen mo/ /sh+lo ka nyis brgya brgyad cu/ 'phags pa gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa/ sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bzhi bcu// //gzungs che phra sna tshogs

la/ 'phags pa rdo rje ri rab chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa nor bu rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu gnas pa dam pa'i cho ga zhib mo rgyal po'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa rdo

rje mchu'i gzungs/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa rdo rje snying po'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka sum brgya nyi shu ste bam po gcig dang / sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs bam po gcig /'phags pa sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u/ bam po gcig /

'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa byang chub snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa stobs po che'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs yid bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa me kha la'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can/ sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal

mo sgron ma mchog /sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba/ sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i

gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu/ 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po/ /sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzungs/

sh+lo ka brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa dgu/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka brgyad

cu rtsa drug /'phags pa rgyal ba can/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa gcig /'phags pa khyad par can/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ 'phags pa gza' rnams kyi yum/ sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa gzungs chen mo/ /

sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po/ /sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa kun du bzang po/ /

sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa phyed dang gsum/ 'phags pa snying rje mchog /sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa gser can/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa rgya chen shugs ldan 'od kyi rig sngags/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad/ 'phags

pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa be con chen po/ /sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa gsum/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags

pa rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog /sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i cho ga zhib mo/ /sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags

pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo kun nas 'od/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa dgu/ 'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag /sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa dgu/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi

snying po/ /sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa sa'i dbang po/ /sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa phyed dang brgyad/ 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa

rin po che'i phring ba/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi yum/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa drug /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa lnga/ gzhan gyis

mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gsum/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gsum/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa ha

ya grI ba'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i snying po/ /sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi snying po/ /sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa

gzhang 'brum zhi bar byed pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa 'od zer can/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 'phags pa dug sel gyi rig sngags/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa phyed dang gnyis/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa

thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig /'phags pa lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i ming brgyad po/ /gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa ngan

'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i snying po/ sgo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa par+Na sha ba ri/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa yi dags kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/

sh+lo ka bcu dgu/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa/ sh+lo ka bco brgyad/ 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa/ sh+lo ka bcu bdun/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/ /sh+lo ka bcu drug /'phags pa mchod pa'i sprin/ sh+lo ka bcu drug /'phags pa las kyi sgrib thams cad rnam

par sbyong ba/ sh+lo ka bco lnga/ 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa/ sh+lo ka bco lnga/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa/ sh+lo ka bco lnga/ 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i snying po sh+lo ka bco lnga/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo dbugs chen po/ /sh+lo ka bcu

bzhi/ 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa stobs can/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa bu mang po bton pa/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa lha mo nag mo'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka bcu gsum/ 'phags pa

rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/ 'phags pa dpal chen po'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu gcig /'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba/ sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i snying po/ /sh+lo ka bcu/

'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka bcu/ 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba/ sh+lo ka dgu/ 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka brgyad/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i ming

bcu gnyis pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad/ 'phags pa stong 'gyur gyi gzungs/ sh+lo ka bdun/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka phyed dang bdun/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi blo 'phel ba'i gzungs/ sh+lo ka lnga// //mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor byang chub sems dpa'

brgyad dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ phan yon dang bcas pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka

nyis brgya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa lha mo nor gyi rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu// //bstod pa sna tshogs la/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ dpe

med par bstod pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa lnga/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa/ sh+lo ka bco brgyad/ don dam par bstod pa/ sh+lo ka bcu/ sku gsum la bstod pa/ sh+lo ka dgu/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod pa'i tshig gi sdeb sbyor

slob dpon sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan mu med par bstod pa/ slob dpon rat+naDa pas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa lha mo sgrol ma 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar bstod pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad

pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pas bsngags pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i gnas su bstod pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa la spobs pa skyes pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag na rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug la snying rje'i bstod pa/ sh+lo ka bco lnga/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la bstod pa/ rgyal po shi wi kra ma a dI r+yas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ nad kyi bdag mo la bstod pa bram ze mchog sred kyis byas pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ lha mo nam gru la bstod pa/ sh+lo ka bco lnga// //smon lam

sna tshogs la/ 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa nor bu rin po che dge ba brtan pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po/ /sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed

pa'i bsngo ba/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa'i bsngo ba/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba/ sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ /sh+lo ka

dgu bcu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa smon lam bdun cu pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa gsum/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum/ rin po che phreng ba'i smon lam/ sh+lo ka bco brgyad/ byang chub dam pa'i smon lam/ sh+lo ka phyed dang bcu bzhi/ byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon

lam/ sh+lo ka bcu tham pa// //bkra shis kyi rnam grangs la/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa chen po sh+lo ka sum cu/ shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa drug /bkra shis su bya'i tshigs su

bcad pa/ sh+lo ka bcu bdun/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ blo ka sum cu rtsa phyed dang lnga/ yang bde legs su bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/ yang bde legs su gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sgo ka dgu// //'dul ba'i sde snod la/ 'dul

ba lung gzhi/ sh+lo ka sum khri nyis stong bdun brgya ste bam po brgya rtsa dgu/ 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum/ 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong drug brgya ste bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/ 'dul ba gzhung bla ma/

sh+lo ka khri drug stong nyis brgya ste bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ 'dul ba zhus lan/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig yan chad 'gyur/ dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ sh+lo ka bdun stong bzhi brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ dge slong pha'i so sor thar ba'i

lam/ /sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo/ /sh+lo ka brgyad brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'dul ba mdo/ /sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun brgya ste bam po dgu/ las brgya rtsa gcig pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug

brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ 'dul ba bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ 'dul ba bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel ba/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig /'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig gi bshad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ 'dul ba phran

tshegs 'grel ba/ sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ 'dul ba gzhung bla ma'i rgya cher 'grel ba/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/ so sor thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba chen po/ /sh+lo ka sum khri sum stong drug brgya ste bam po brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/ so sor thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ 'dul

ba kun las btus pa/ sh+lo ka khri lnga stong ste/ bam po lnga bcu/ so sor thar pa'i gzhung 'grel/ sh+lo ka brgyad stong chig brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/ yang so sor thar pa'i 'grel ba/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ so sor thar pa'i tshig

gi brjed byang / sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'dul ba'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyi khri chig stong ste bam po bdun cu// //thams cad yod par smra ba dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas

pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ tshig le'ur byas pa sum brgya pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /sum brgya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'od ldan/ sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste bam po brgyad/ 'dul ba dri ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ 'dul ba dri ba'i tshig gi rgya cher bshad pa/ sh+lo ka

stong drug brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi ste bam po lnga dang sh+lo ka brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi/ sde pa bco brgyad kyi ming dang rim pa/ slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa lnga/ gzhung tha dad pa bklag pa'i 'khor lo las sde pa tha dad pa bstan pa/ slob dpon dbyig pa shes kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/

dge slong gi tshul/ mkhan po bo d+hi sa twas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ ma byin par len pa'i skabs na/ mkhan po bzhis dpyad pa sh+lo ka nyi shu// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i tI kA la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gyi 'grel pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka nyi khri sum stong bzhi brgya ste bam

po bdun cu rtsa brgyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum dang nyi khri lnga stong dang / khri brgyad stong pa'i rgya cher bshad pa sh+lo ka brgyad stong chig brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po

gnyis/ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'phags pa sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya ba'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/

sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ yang bdun brgya ba'i bshad pa/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug /yang bdun brgya ba'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ yang bdun brgya ba'i bshad pa/ slob dpon dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad

pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ yang tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa gsang sngags kyi tshul du bshad pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/

slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ yang rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ yang rdo rje gcod pa'i rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo

ka lnga bcu/ yang rdo rje gcod pa'i rnam par bshad pa tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA chen

po/ sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong ste bam po drug cu/ yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ slob dpon klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka khri nyis stong ste bam po bzhi bcu/ yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i byams pa'i le'u nyi tshe bshad pa/ slob dpon ye shes

snying pos mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya bdun cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bdun cu/ yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i bsdus 'grel/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i bshad pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi

shu/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos nyid zab mo'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/ 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya drug cu ste bam po bcu bzhi dang

sh+lo ka drug cu/ sa bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i bshad pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ sa bcu pa'i gleng gzhi'i bshad pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /sa bcu pa'i don bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa puN+Da rI

ka'i don bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa ga ya mgo ri'i mdo'i rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ 'phags pa ga ya mgo ri'i mdo dang spel mar bshad pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par bshad pa/ slob

dpon ngang tshul bzang pos mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ sangs rgyas kyis las tshig gi don bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i 'od srungs kyi le'u'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug /

'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ sA lu ljang pa'i mdo tshigs bcad du bsdus pa'i 'grel pa/

slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong sum brgya rtsa bco lnga ste bam po bzhi dang / sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bco lnga/ sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa'i tshig

le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya dgu bcu/ 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug /

yang sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi bshad pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gcig /'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsum la/ sh+lo ka drug brgya sum cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /

'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa sh+lo ka sum cu/ yang chos bzhi pa'i bshad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa bzhi/ 'phags pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyis

mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad brgya ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ yang bzang po spyod pa'i bshad sbyar/ slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ yang bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos

mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gnyis/ bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon rgyan bzang pos mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gnyis/ yang bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa rnam pa bzhi ka las btus te brjed byang du bgyis pa mkhan po

ye shes sdes mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ dgongs pa bzhi dang / ldem por dgongs pa bzhi bshad pa'i brjed byang / mkhan po ye shes sdes mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya// //mdo sde'i TI kA rgya las bsgyur ba la/ 'phags pa

dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA chen po/ /sh+lo ka khri nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun cu rtsa bzhi/ yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA /sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun rgya ste bam po dgu/ 'phags pa puN+Da rI ka'i 'grel pa rgya las bsgyur ba/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/

'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa chen po rgya las bsgyur ba/ sh+lo ka khri nyis stong ste bam po bzhi bcu/ yang lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya drug cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya drug cu/ yang lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa bin tar ta li las

bsgyur ba/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa/ rgya las bsgyur ba/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ chos kyi rgya mo'i bshad pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi// //dbu ma'i bstan bcos la/ dbu

ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste bam po gcig dang / sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu/ dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/ shes rab sgron ma'i rgya cher bshad

pa/ slob dpon spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong ste bam po brgyad cu/ yang dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon bud+d+ha pA li tas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ yang dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa ga las 'jig med/ sh+lo ka nyis

stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ dbu ma rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ dbu ma rgyan gyi 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ dbu ma rgyan gyi dka' 'grel/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo

ka sum cu rtsa bdun/ bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i dka' 'grel/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ dbu ma de kho na nyid snang ba/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ dbu ma

snang ba/ sh+lo ka nyis stong dgu brgya ste bam po dgu/ de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i rab tu byed pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ de kho na la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ de kho na nyid la rtsod pa bzlog pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/

sh+lo ka bdun cu/ rtsod pa bzlog pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya ste bam po gcig dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa gnyis/ rigs pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya drug cu ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka
