brgya drug cu/ stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa bzhi/ stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya brgyad cu/ stong pa nyid kyi sgo bcu gnyis pa rtsa ba dang 'grel par bcas pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang / de'i rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka lnga/ lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa sh+lo ka lnga/ lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ yang lag pa'i chad kyi 'grel

pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ byang chub sems kyi rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ dbu ma'i snying po mdor bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par grub pa/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste bam po gcig

dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ sku gsum la 'jug pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug /sku gsum la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu// //bsam gtan gyi yi ge la/ bsgom pa'i rim pa

rnam pa gsum slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ bsgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon badzra kI rtis mdzad pa/ bam po gcig /yang bsgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/ bam po gcig /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa slob

dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ slob dpon many+dzu shrI mi tras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa brgyad/ bsgom pa'i sgo bstan pa/ slob dpon ka la ya na warmas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa bdun/ bsgom pa'i rim pa/

slob dpon d+ha rma ma tis mdzad pa sh+lo ka sum cu/ bsam gtan gyi yi ge rgya las bsgyur ba/ slob dpon bo d+hi d+ha rma ta ras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum// //rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos la/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las/ sa mang po ba sh+lo ka bdun stong

brgyad brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa drug /gzhi bsdu ba/ sh+lo ka lnga stong bdun brgya dgu bcu ste bam po bcu dgu dang sh+lo ka dgu bcu/ rnam grangs bsdu ba/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ nyan thos kyi sa/ sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya ste bam po bco

brgyad/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ sh+lo ka drug stong chig brgya lnga bcu ste bam po nyi shu dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ rnam par bshad pa'i sgo bsdu ba sh+lo ka lnga bcu ste bam po gcig dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu ba/ sh+lo ka khri

chig stong lnga brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste bam po sum cu rtsa brgyad dang / sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ sa mang po'i rgya cher bshad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon rgya mtsho sprin gyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/ rnal

'byor spyod pa'i sa las dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa le'u nyi tshe bshad pa logs su phyung ba/ sh+lo ka sum brgya drug cu rtsa lnga ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa lnga/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u nyi tshe bshad pa logs su phyung ba/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ de'i rgya cher

bshad pa sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ 'dul ba bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ theg pa chen po bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka stong chig brgya bdun cu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/ theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum cu ste

bam po bcu dang sh+lo ka sum cu/ don gsang ba bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/ chos mngon pa kun las btus pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug /de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig /mdo sde rgyan gyi tshig

le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ mdo sde rgyan gyi bshad pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong nyis brgya bdun cu ste bam po bcu dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/ mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ dbus dang mtha' rnam par

'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ de'i 'grel bshad/ sh+lo ka sum stong lnga brgya ste bam po bcu gcig dang / sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa'i sh+lo ka brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis/

phung po lnga'i rnam par bshad pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya lnga bcu rtsa gcig ste bam po lnga dang / sh+lo ka sum stong lnga bcu rtsa gcig /phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ phung po lnga'i bshad pa/

slong dpon sa'i rtsa lag gis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon blo gros brtan pas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ sum cu pa'i rab tu byed pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ sum cu pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon blo gros

brtan pas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ sum cu pa'i 'grel bshad/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste bam po lnga dang sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/ nyi shu pa'i rab tu byed pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/ nyi shu

pa'i 'grel bshad/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gsum/ rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po bcu/ rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan blo gros kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ las

bsgrub pa la rab tu byed pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa/ bam po bzhi/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig// //theg pa

chen po'i bstan bcos sna tshogs la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa kun las btus pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/ skyes pa rabs kyi rgyud/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ mdo sde sna tshogs kyi mdo bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya

ste bam po bdun/ mdo kun las btus pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ rin po che'i phreng pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ de'i 'grel pa sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/ pha

rol tu phyin pa btus pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ tshigs su bcad pa'i don btus pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ shes rab brgya pa'i rab tu

byed pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa bdun/ de bshad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ grogs po'i spring yig /sh+lo ka brgya/ de'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon blo gros chen pos mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ste bam po bzhi

dang / sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ slob ma la spring ba'i spring yig slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ de'i dka' 'grel slob dpon bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ rgyal po ka ni ka la spring ba'i spring yig slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la spring ba'i spring yig /sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/ gces pa brgyad cu pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad cu/ sdom pa nyi shu pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu/ de'i 'grel pa slob dpon shAn+ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ bam po gnyis/ tshigs su

bcad pa brgya pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod/ slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ lta ba'i bye brag slob dpon nyi ma'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'jig rten pha rol bsgrub pa/ mkhan po

ye shes sdes mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/

sh+lo ka sum cu/ de'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka bcu/ bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa slob dpon dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ gsang ba'i gnas su bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ bam po gsum// //theg pa chung ngu'i

bstan bcos la/ chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ mdzod kyi 'grel pa sh+lo ka dgu stong ste bam po sum cu/ de'i 'grel bshad slob dpon ya sho mi tras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong ste bam po drug cu/ yang

mdzod kyi 'grel pa slob dpon saM g+ha b+ha dras mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/ yang mdzod kyi 'grel pa/ slob dpon shAn+ti swa mas mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/ mdzod kyi thabs bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/ chos

mngon pa la 'jug pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang / sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ de'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ de'i snying po kun las btus pa/ sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu ste bam po drug dang / sh+lo ka lnga bcu// //tar

ka'i phyogs la/ las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa brtags pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/ de'i 'grel pa sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ rigs pa'i thigs pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /de'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon d+ha rma ut+tas mdzad pa/ sh+lo

ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/ de'i rgya cher bshad pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka brgya/ rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma bsdus pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ gtan

tshigs thigs pa sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/ 'brel pa brtags pa/ sh+lo ka drug brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa bzhi/ dmigs pa brtag pa/ sh+lo ka brgyad/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi brgya

lnga bcu rtsa lnga ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga/ gzhan sel ba grub pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa gnyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa/ sh+lo ka lnga bcu/ bdag med pa grub pa/ sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa gcig /phyi rol gyi yul grub pa/ slob dpon shu pa gup+tas

mdzad pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /dbang phyug 'jug pa grub pa/ sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa dgu/ 'jig rten pha rol grub pa/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ de'i 'grel pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig /thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa/

sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtags pa grub pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig /spyi tha dad med pa dgag pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig /spyi tha dad pa dgag pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/ dbu ma brtag pa/ sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ thos pa brtag

pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig/ //btsad po khri srong lde btsan gyis mdzad pa'i gtsug lag la/ bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma/ sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skad rta/ sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/

byams pa'i bstod pa chen po/ /sh+lo ka bzhi brgya ste bam po gcig dang / sh+lo ka brgya/ byams pa'i bstod pa chung du/ sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/ grub pa'i mtha' 'gro ba/ sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/ dbu ma'i gzer bu/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan gyi

man ngag gol sa brgyad btsal ba btsad pos bkas bcad pa/ sh+lo ka sum cu/ gsung rab zhu chen ma bgyis pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bzhi pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa chen po gnyis gtan la ma phab/ bstan bcos bsgyur 'phro la/ dbu

ma'i gzhung zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa rtsa ba dang / 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/ dbu ma'i snying po rtog ge 'bar ba rtsa ba dang / 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/ tshad ma rnam 'grel/ bam po bcu gcig /rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa/ bam po bco brgyad/ rtsod pa'i rigs pa/

bam po gcig /tshad ma de kho na bsdus pa rtsa ba dang 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/ gsung rab mdo sde dang bstan bcos thams cad la sh+lo ka dang / bam po'i grangs gtan la phab ste zhu chen zin to 'tshal thams cad 'brug gi lo la pho brang lhan dkar du mtshan byang dkar chag tu btab pa rdzogs so// //
